newsitem.title: USA: Stac sets Dutch Auction for 6.0 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Stac sets Dutch Auction for 6.0 mln shrs.

text.p: Stac Inc Thursday announced a Dutch Auction tender offer for up to 6.0 million shares of its common stock, beginning today and expiring Sept. 11, unless extended.
Terms of the offer include a purchase price ranging from $4.75 to $5.50 a share, net to the seller in cash.
The offer replaces Stac's plans to buy back $20 million of its common stock. As of August 13, the company had repurchased about 165,000 shares, leaving 30.6 million shares outstanding.
The offer's dealer manager is Smith Barney Inc.
Shares of Stac were up 11/16 at 4-13/16 by mid-morning.
